prompts: Create a sleek and agile Pokemon with icy blue fur and sharp claws.
Imagine a Pokemon that excels in stealth with dark colors and quick movements.
Generate a mischievous creature with vibrant pink accents and a playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains with a focus on speed.
Design a creature that embodies cunning and agility, featuring pointed ears and quick reflexes.
Make a Pokemon that blends into its forest habitat, sporting stealthy colors and features.
Give me a Pokemon that is both elusive and fierce, with a unique body shape.
